description: Welcome to HOMESTEAD - a boutique collection of modern farmhouse-style homes near top schools, shopping, transit & quick HWY 1 access! Nearly new 4 bed, 2.5 bath with bright open layout, 9' ceilings & a chef's kitchen featuring quartz counters, S/S appliances, 5-burner gas range, farmhouse sink & built-in microwave. Enjoy a large deck w/ gas BBQ hookup, stylish powder room, spacious primary suite w/ walk-in & spa ensuite, plus 24' double garage w/ EV charger, A/C, hot water on demand & turfed front yard - modern living at its best!
